General.Name: Arvind Fashions Limited
General.Description: Arvind Fashions Limited engages in retailing of garments, cosmetics, and accessories in India. It provides a portfolio of owned and licensed brands, such as US Polo Assn., Arrow, Tommy Hilfiger, Flying Machine, Calvin Klein, and Sephora. The company also offers beauty products, and footwear and accessories. In addition, the company sells its menswear, womenswear, and kidswear products through retail and departmental stores, as well as e-commerce platforms. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Arvind J&M Limited. Arvind Fashions Limited was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

6.Name: Mr. Sumit  Dhingra
6.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Heritage Brands Division
